name: M-Span DS
description: M-Span DS is a medicine containing cefixime. M-Span is an antibiotic that is used for treating a wide range of bacterial infections. This antibiotic is classified as a cephalosporin. It works by preventing bacteria from growing. This antibiotic is solely used to treat bacterial infections. It is ineffective against viral infections (such as common cold, flu).Get this product at Dawaai, offering the most reasonable prices in Pakistan.
label: medicine
